abstract: Validates the document against the governing schema and returns whether the document conforms to the schema.
overview:
## Discussion

The constants indicating the kind of validation errors are emitted by the underlying parser; see `NSXMLParser.h` for most of these constants. If the schema is defined with a DTD, this method uses the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTD] object set for the receiver for validation. If the schema is based on XML Schema, the method uses the URL specified as the value of the `xsi:schemaLocation` attribute of the root element.

You can validate an XML document when it is first processed by specifying the `NSXMLDocumentValidate` option when you initialize an `NSXMLDocument` object with the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(contentsOf:options:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(data:options:)], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(xmlString:options:)] methods.

# validate()

**Instance Method**

Validates the document against the governing schema and returns whether the document conforms to the schema.

## Declaration

```swift
func validate() throws
```

## Discussion

The constants indicating the kind of validation errors are emitted by the underlying parser; see `NSXMLParser.h` for most of these constants. If the schema is defined with a DTD, this method uses the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTD] object set for the receiver for validation. If the schema is based on XML Schema, the method uses the URL specified as the value of the `xsi:schemaLocation` attribute of the root element.

You can validate an XML document when it is first processed by specifying the `NSXMLDocumentValidate` option when you initialize an `NSXMLDocument` object with the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(contentsOf:options:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(data:options:)], or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/init(xmlString:options:)] methods.
title: validate()
